name: Proper Mini Golf (Early Access)
description:
Good ol' classic game of mini golf done right. Enjoy this slow paced game, take in the sounds, and relax.  As this game is only in Early Access, only one 18 hole course is complete. Any game, sound, or UI choice is not final and is subject to change at any time. 

Release Date: 9/2/2022

Discord: https://discord.gg/BfUe5UaRqU

 Twitter: https://twitter.com/SwopeStudios
